title: Trade Shows in Charlotte Leverage Custom Canopy Tents for Brand Visibility
summary: Exhibitors in Charlotte, NC, are using custom canopy tents to enhance brand visibility and ROI at trade shows.
charlotte_impact: Highlights innovative marketing strategies businesses are using to stand out and maximize their impact at local events.

title: Mosaic Capital Partners Seeks Vice President of Business Development
summary: Mosaic Capital Partners, a Charlotte-based private equity firm, is seeking a VP of Business Development.
charlotte_impact: Indicates growth and investment in the local financial sector, creating job opportunities in the region.

title: Florence Regional Airport Sees Passenger Increase Despite Flight Loss
summary: Florence Regional Airport saw increased passenger traffic in 2025 but lost an American Airlines flight to Charlotte.
charlotte_impact: Reflects the ongoing challenges and opportunities for regional airports in maintaining and expanding service.

title: Women Charged in Torture and Death of Girl in NC
summary: Three women in North Carolina are charged with torturing and killing a girl, allegedly keeping her in a dog crate.
charlotte_impact: Highlights a tragic case of child abuse and raises serious concerns about the safety and well-being of children.

title: Homeowners Reassessing When to Sell Amid Shifting Market Conditions
summary: Homeowners are reassessing when to sell their homes as market conditions shift, according to Travis Buys Home.
charlotte_impact: Provides insight into the changing dynamics of the local real estate market and homeowner behavior.

title: KPN Facilitates $20M in Acquisitions, Expands Partnerships
summary: KPN Consulting Services facilitated $20M in acquisitions and is expanding economic development partnerships.
charlotte_impact: Demonstrates the firm's role in driving economic growth and supporting small businesses in the Charlotte area.

title: CATS Expands Ways for Riders to Report Safety Concerns
summary: Charlotte Area Transit System (CATS) is expanding reporting options for safety concerns with a Text-a-Tip line.
charlotte_impact: Shows a commitment to improving safety and security for public transportation riders in the city.

title: Mooresville Woman Wins $1 Million Powerball Prize
summary: A Mooresville woman won a $1 million Powerball prize after matching all five white balls in the Feb. 9 drawing.
charlotte_impact: A feel-good story about a local resident's good fortune, generating excitement and interest in the lottery.

title: Waymo Confirms Self-Driving Cars Are Coming to Charlotte
summary: Waymo confirms its self-driving cars are coming to Charlotte, enabled by a 2017 state law.
charlotte_impact: Indicates Charlotte's readiness for technological advancements and its potential as a hub for autonomous vehicles.

title: Raccoon Tests Positive for Rabies in Caldwell County
summary: A raccoon tested positive for rabies in a horse pasture along Echo Drive in Caldwell County.
charlotte_impact: Raises awareness about the importance of rabies prevention and animal safety in the community.

title: Charlotte Firefighters Call for Higher Pay, Better Benefits
summary: The Charlotte Firefighters Association is advocating for higher pay and better benefits to keep pace with city growth.
charlotte_impact: Highlights the challenges faced by first responders and the need for competitive compensation in a growing city.

title: A Windy Wednesday; Rainy Thursday
summary: Weather forecast predicts a windy Wednesday followed by a rainy Thursday.
charlotte_impact: Provides essential weather information for residents to plan their activities and prepare for changing conditions.

title: Suspect Arrested in 2024 Homicide in North Charlotte
summary: A suspect was arrested on Feb. 24 in connection to a deadly shooting that occurred in north Charlotte in 2024.
charlotte_impact: Offers closure in a cold case and reinforces law enforcement's commitment to solving crimes, even years later.

title: Trump Mentions Iryna Zarutska's Killing During State of the Union
summary: Trump mentioned Iryna Zarutska's killing and recognized her mother during the 2026 State of the Union Address.
charlotte_impact: Brings national attention to a local tragedy and highlights the issue of repeat criminal offenders.

title: Teen Charged in Rock Hill Shooting to Remain in Jail
summary: A 16-year-old charged in a deadly Rock Hill shooting will remain in jail as the investigation continues.
charlotte_impact: Addresses concerns about youth violence and the legal process for juvenile offenders in the region.
